body: I’m going to hell for fapping to this shit
I, too, have wasted my life

List of crimes in this doujin: Moral harassment, sexual harassment, bullying, rape, pedophilia, stealing, pedo images, image sharing w/o the consent of one, sharing someone's image with the objective to deprave.
Officer, I wasn't fapping to this, I was just examining its contents whilst getting a boner.
We at ATF also do commissions. If you have a doujin you want translated or edited, please check the following link for more information: https://translations.allthefallen.ninja/?page_id=872
